// FFmpeg Settings: Configure where FFmpeg binaries are located

FFmpeg.// Path: Path to ffmpeg.exe/ffmpeg (or directory containing it). If not set, auto-downloads on first use.
FFmpeg.// CacheDirectory: Where to store downloaded FFmpeg. Default: %LOCALAPPDATA%/consoleimage/ffmpeg

Render.// CharacterAspectRatio: Character aspect ratio (width/height). 0.5 means chars are 2x taller than wide.
Render.// ContrastPower: Contrast enhancement (1.0 = none, higher = more contrast)
Render.// CharacterSetPreset: Character set: extended (default), simple, block, classic

Playback.// LoopCount: Number of loops (0 = infinite, 1 = play once)
Playback.// BufferAheadFrames: Frames to buffer ahead for smooth playback (2-10)
Playback.// UseHardwareAcceleration: Use GPU hardware acceleration if available
